entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
